name: Spirevale
description:
Latest Updates

The new client and server are being polished for upload. The server will be running on a dedicated host, which means you will be able to play 24 hours a day, seven days a week!

Changelog - Friday, February 24, 2018

  • Redesigned the login screen.
  • Redesigned the registration screen.
  • Added the character creation process.
    • You can only create one character per account for now.
  • Optimised the server code.
    • Switched command parameters to unsigned eight-bit integers.
    • Added support for boolean parameters.
    • Refactored code to be more readable, allowing efficient updates.
    • Fixed server crashes caused during title screen sequences.
  • Refactored the client code to be more organised.
Introduction Welcome to this wonderful world, familiar to the inhabitants as Spirevale. Indulge yourself in a world of mystery in this massive multiplayer role-playing game! Collect resources while chatting with friends using the integrated chat system.


Developer Notes

This description will be updated as development progresses. This upload is in an extremely early developmental phase, it is meant for testing purposes, and it should not be viewed as an indication of the final product.

If you have any feature suggestions, or if you experience a bug, please feel free to open an issue on our GitHub:
https://github.com/Grimview/spirevale/issues
